results.text: ምግብም ከእሳት ሰዎች ቁስል እጣቢ (እዥ) በስተቀር የለውም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እርሱም የባለቅኔ ቃል (ግጥም) አይደለም፡፡ ጥቂትን ብቻ ታምናላችሁ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: የጠንቋይም ቃል አይደለም፡፡ ጥቂትን ብቻ ታስታውሳላችሁ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
